page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE, CONTINUED
page.content: When we went back to the classrom we had a drawing lesson and finished our day with a story. School finished at 3.30pm and we walked home. The weather has been good so we played out with my friends, if it had been raining I would have watched T.V. or played on our computer untill tea time. Tea time is usually when the family is together and we talk about our day. After tea we played out then I did some reading untill bed time at 8.30pm. I share a bedroom with my brother so we had a chat before we settled down to sleep. {SOME LOCAL PLACE NAMES} Some local names come from the Cloth Industry which once existed on Snowden Hill.We get Cloth Hall Farm, and Tenter Hall Farm from this source. Salter Hill Lane takes its name from the Saltersgate to Rotherham Turnpike.
